title: any, or payments made for grants of any concessions, Provided that if the development is proposed to the extent of protected built-up area only as per a) above, 9 m road width shall be considered adequate
clause_text: any, or payments made for grants of any concessions, Provided that if the development is proposed to the extent of protected built-up area only as per a) above, 9 m road width shall be considered adequate. However, if development is proposed with more area than protected as per regulation then, the restrictions as per regulation 19(2) shall be applicable. Areas of structures permitted in LOS under clause (g)of sub-Regulation
